name: 2nd Global Conference on Aging and Gerontology
content: We are delighted to announce the Global Conference on Aging and Gerontology, a significant event aimed at fostering research and discussion in the fields of aging and gerontology. This conference provides a unique platform for scholars, practitioners, and policymakers to exchange knowledge and explore the latest advancements. Conference Themes We encourage submissions that explore a variety of topics within the following areas: Aging: Including studies on the biological, psychological, and social aspects of aging. Gerontology: Encompassing research on elder care, geriatric health, retirement, and the social implications of an aging population. Submission and Review Process Submitted abstracts will be carefully reviewed by our Scientific Committee to ensure they meet high standards of academic rigor and relevance. This thorough review process ensures that the conference features high-quality, impactful research. Presentation Formats The conference offers several presentation formats to cater to different preferences and enhance the dissemination of research: Virtual Presentations: Enabling participants to present their work remotely. Oral Presentations: Providing a detailed and interactive platform for sharing research findings. Poster Presentations: Facilitating visual and interactive engagement with research. Publication Opportunities Accepted papers will have the chance to be published in a range of reputable journals and conference proceedings, broadening the reach and impact of the research. Additional Perks Invitation Letter: Registered participants attending in person will receive a complimentary invitation letter to support visa applications. City Tour: Enjoy a free guided tour of the host city, offering an opportunity to experience local culture and attractions. We invite you to join us at the Global Conference on Aging and Gerontology for an enriching experience of academic exchange, professional development, and cultural exploration. We look forward to your valuable contributions and to welcoming you to this important event.
